job.title: Python Engineer - Geospatial Software
job.description:
Title:
Python Engineer
Location:
Temporary Full Remote - Denver, CO
Salary:
$130,000 - $140,000/year
Requirements:
Python, SQL, SaaS
Based out of Mountain View, CA, this position will be remote until we open an office in Denver, at which time it will be partially remote. We have been in business for 7 years. We are a rapidly growing company specializing in machine learning, and our technology helps increase the understanding of our earth and the built environments. We have seen a 16% growth in headcount over the last 6 months, and have focused most of this growth on our engineering department. We have a variety of different systems, ranging from client-facing web apps to our highly scalable, fast, deep-learning pipeline.
If you are a Python Engineer with 3 years of experience, please read on!
What You Will Be Doing
Build and implement applications and frameworks for our clients
Integrate with other teams to create solutions for problems that the customer defines
Create new features based on customer feedback, while also predicting necessary enhancements based on user data.
Practice strong TDD methodologies
Participate in full lifecycle development.
Introduce new technologies that will help improve our product's overall functionality.
You will work with data science, machine learning, and AI teams to improve our overall software and grow your own skills in these areas.
What You Need for this Position
Python
SQL
JavaScript
SaaS
Nice to Have Experience
Machine Learning
Artificial Intelligence
AWS
What's In It for You
Competitive Base Salary - $130K - $140K
Health, Dental, Vision, and Life Insurance
PTO
401K with matching
Bonus
So, If You Are a PythonEngineer With Experience
Apply directly to this job opening here!
Or
E-mail directly for more information to Steve.Nash@cybercoders.com
Email Your Resume In Word To
Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:
Meaghan.Curran@CyberCoders.com
Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : SN1-1636303 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***
Meaghan Curran - Sr. Executive Recruiter - CyberCoders
Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.
CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
Your Right to Work
- In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
